articles.title: Rich Strike crowned winner of 2022 Kentucky Derby - CBS News
articles.description: Rich Strike came back from behind to pull off a stunning win Saturday at Churchill Downs.
articles.content:
With favorite Epicenter and Zandon dueling in front, Rich Strike came charging up the rail for a stunning 80-1 upset in the Kentucky Derby on Saturday.

articles.title: Taliban orders women to cover up head to toe in Afghanistan: "We want our sisters to live with dignity" - CBS News
